name: Bubble Speed Test HD Free - The Speedtest Mania Safari Game Saga for iPhone & iPad
name_original: Bubble Speed Test HD Free - The Speedtest Mania Safari Game Saga for iPhone & iPad
description:
### Now you can test how fast you really are! ###
### One of the best game to test your brain and finger speed! ###

Now is the time to find out how fast you really are. Every time when you touch a coin, then new coin appear. How many coins you can collect in a minute. Very easy and fun game for everybody.

[ FEATURES ]

+ support iOS7
+ Awesome gameplay
+ Easy to learn
+ Hectic gameplay

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other great games, so type "Codecube brothers" to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com.

Thanks for your support!
